rows.label: qst002204_msg0001
rows.name:
Mellica? What about her?
I don't know that much about
those fancy Choir types.

rows.label: qst002204_msg0002
rows.name:
Though I could tell you a bit
about the Choir itself.

rows.label: qst002204_msg0003
rows.name:
Apparently, once you join the Choir of
Acedia, you're basically set for life.

rows.label: qst002204_msg0004
rows.name:
I mean, it's an official branch of the
Holy See, so naturally they get
special treatment.

rows.label: qst002204_msg0005
rows.name:
Us refugees don't get much in
the way of opportunities, so lots
of folks dream of joining up.

rows.label: qst002204_msg0006
rows.name:
Course, I didn't make it past the
audition. My mom and dad were
so disappointed.

rows.label: qst002204_msg0007
rows.name:
Anyway, that's about all the
info I've got.
